Package io.github.frc5024.lib5k.hardware.ctre.sensors

Class ExtendedPigeonIMU

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctre.phoenix.sensors.PigeonIMU
      • io.github.frc5024.lib5k.hardware.ctre.sensors.ExtendedPigeonIMU
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gyro, IGyroscope, ISimGyro, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class ExtendedPigeonIMU
extends com.ctre.phoenix.sensors.PigeonIMU
implements ISimGyro
    A wrapper for the CTRE PigeonIMU that brings it into the 5024 ecosystem. http://www.ctr-electronics.com/gadgeteer-imu-module-pigeon.html#product_tabs_technical_resources

      • initDrivebaseSimulation

        public GyroSimUtil initDrivebaseSimulation​(IDifferentialDrivebase drivebase)
        Description copied from interface: ISimGyro
        Set up drivebase-locked gyro simulation. This estimates the gyro's angle by analyzing encoder data over time. This is only accurate in simulations, and should never be trusted IRL
        Specified by:
        initDrivebaseSimulation in interface ISimGyro
        Parameters:
        drivebase - Drivebase to read from
        Returns:
        Reference to the simulator

        Init gyroscope simulation from fusing encoder readings
        Parameters:
        drivebase - Robot drivetrain
        startOwnThread - Should this simulation run in its own thread?
